-->{{#tag:indicator|{{Badge|content=<translate><!--T:1--> [[<tvar name=1>Special:MyLanguage/Phabricator</tvar>|Issue tracker]]:</translate> [[phab:tag/{{lc:{{{1}}}}}/|'''#{{{1}}}''']]
}}|name=phabricator-project}}<!--
--></includeonly><noinclude>
{{Documentation|content=

<translate>
<!--T:2-->
This template adds a {{<tvar name=1>ll|Help:Page status indicators</tvar>|page status indicator}} linking to the project's issue tracker (for example, a Phabricator workboard).

<!--T:3-->
Example "<tvar name=1>Foo</tvar>" used on this page.
</translate>
:<nowiki>{{ptag|foo}}</nowiki>
{{ptag|foo}}

<templatedata>
{
	"params": {
		"1": {}
	},
	"description": "Add page status indicator with a badge linking to a Phabricator project.",
	"format": "inline"
}
</templatedata>

<translate>
== See also == <!--T:4-->
</translate>
* {{ll|Template:Tracked}} - <translate><!--T:5--> right-floating box for specific tasks</translate>
* {{ll|Template:Phabricator}} - <translate><!--T:6--> similar to <tvar name=1><code><nowiki>[[phab:T</nowiki>''nnn''<nowiki>]]</nowiki></code></tvar></translate>
* {{ll|Template:Ptag2}} - <translate><!--T:8--> similar to <tvar name=1>Ptag</tvar> but displays a badge instead of a page-level badge</translate>
* {{ll|Template:Phabricator inline tag}} - <translate><!--T:9--> similar to <tvar name=1>Ptag2</tvar> but displays the link inline</translate>

}}
[[Category:External link templates{{#translation:}}]]
</noinclude>
